title: Update docs with new tensor repr
body_html:
Update the docs as a follow up to #6370.

cc: @gchanan

TODOs:

  • include things from the migration guide (dtype, device charts, etc). They're very nice
  • better docs for torch.layout
  • torch.dtype (aliases) & torch.layout page
  • link torch.no_grad stuff in torch.* docs page
  • torch.set_default_dtype docs
  • Tensor() -> torch.tensor() or torch.empty()
  • nll_loss and binary_cross_entropy examples do not run
  • move torch.dtype/device/cuda up (at least above torch.legacy)
  • LongTensor -> torch.tensor OR torch.empty, depending on use case
  • link arg types to torch.dtype/device (create actual (maybe dummy) class doc)

Not critical/going to pass on these until later date. These are a little hard to actually get to show up in sphinx.

  • somehow include the big infographic on tensor constructors. Maybe make a new docs page?
  • torch.default_generator docs missing

body:
Update the docs as a follow up to #6370.

cc: @gchanan 

TODOs:
- [x] include things from the migration guide (dtype, device charts, etc). They're very nice
- [x] better docs for torch.layout
- [x] torch.dtype (aliases) & torch.layout page
- [x] link torch.no_grad stuff in torch.* docs page
- [x] torch.set_default_dtype docs
- [x] Tensor() -> torch.tensor() or torch.empty()
- [x] nll_loss and binary_cross_entropy examples do not run
- [x] move torch.dtype/device/cuda up (at least above torch.legacy)
- [x] LongTensor -> torch.tensor OR torch.empty, depending on use case
- [x] link arg types to torch.dtype/device (create actual (maybe dummy) class doc)

Not critical/going to pass on these until later date. These are a little hard to actually get to show up in sphinx.
- [ ] somehow include the big infographic on tensor constructors. Maybe make a new docs page?
- [ ] torch.default_generator docs missing
